page.title: 14Arts and Crafts Sculpture(2)
page.content: In 1979 Adriano gained entry to the Dyfed College of Art. He completed a four year diploma course in two years. A modest and simple man whose sculp- tures reveal the keen appreciative eye of the artist; his sensitivity in design and the creativity of the craftsman. His work can be found in America and most European countries.He uses various materials;terracotta,cold cast,wood,cement,bronze & aluminium.At the moment he is completing a set of' Craftsmen{'sculptures. {The Doubler} Ty Elwyn, Llanelli. {The Coalface {The Blacksmith }Elinor Jones ,H.T.V. {The Copper Miner}Cardiff Ind. Museum. {The Coal Mine} Cardiff Ind. Museum. {The Cooper {The Slate Cutter } HIS WORK SPEAKS MORE FOR HIM THAN HE DOES FOR HIMSELF.
